report.name: etalo05

dataSource.name: Q_etalo05
dataSource.select: SELECT lfa.lcodcompta dc_lcodcompta, cpt.comlib dc_comlib, decode(lfa.typfact, 'A', ((-1 * lfa.lmontht) * (lfa.tva/100 +1)), lfa.lmontht * (lfa.tva/100 +1)) dc_montanttc, lfa.socfact dc_socfact, rtrim(soc.soclib) dc_soclib, lfa.numfact dc_numfact, lfa.typfact dc_typfact, lfa.datfact dc_datfact, fac.fenrcompta dc_fenrcompta, fac.fregcompta dc_fregcompta, lfa.lmoisprest dc_lmoisprest, substr(To_char( lfa.ldeppole, 'FM0000000'),1,5) dc_fdeppole, pack_utile.f_get_deppole(substr(To_char( lfa.ldeppole, 'FM0000000'),1,5)) dc_libdeppole, lfa.lsecteur dc_lsecteur, fac.numcont dc_numcont, fac.cav dc_cav, lfa.lcodfinali dc_lcodfinali FROM ligne_fact lfa, facture fac, code_compt cpt, societe soc WHERE fac.numfact = lfa.numfact AND fac.socfact = lfa.socfact AND fac.datfact = lfa.datfact AND fac.typfact = lfa.typfact AND lfa.lcodcompta = cpt.comcode AND fac.socfact=soc.soccode AND ((lfa.lcodcompta = '4355' AND lfa.lcodfinali = 1) OR lfa.lcodcompta ='4376') &p_where

dataDescriptor.expression: decode ( lfa.typfact , 'A' , ( ( - 1 * lfa.lmontht ) * ( lfa.tva / 100 + 1 ) ) , lfa.lmontht * ( lfa.tva / 100 + 1 ) )

function.name: afterpform

report.webSource:
